roleset.name: rise, move forwards
roleset.note: Based on Bolt data. Comparison to surge.01-v. Surge-v is a member of VN classes appear-48.1.1 and calibratable_cos-45.6-1. No FN class. Framed by Katie.

example.name: Args 1 and 2
example.text: Chicago has had a huge surge in their murder rate, after closing down the city projects.
